21 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Around the Web 23 Ridiculously Cool Gadgets You'll Want to Buy Immediately Trending Gadget JayKay1776 11 points 11 hours ago The danger to our constitutional republic is fucking retards calling it a democracy permalink award report block reply OnceADroplet 2 points 10 hours ago The danger is the media swaying the moderates giving them surface level opinions to grasp without second thought to the downstream repercussions.  This naturally creates extremists from intelligent observers who care to peek beneath the surface with honest intentions.  These extremists echo back to the moderates through media manipulation causing them to either blow with the breeze or disengage with the madness entirely. permalink parent award report block reply patrioticwinning3 2 points 10 hours ago That grinds my gears so much! Look it up. This semantics horseshit is retarded. It's the non-Whites who are the problem and always have been. permalink parent award report block reply JayKay1776 1 points 2 hours ago I'll give you $1,000 if you can name one spot in the Constitution where it says democracy. I'll wait permalink parent award report block reply JayKay1776 1 points 1 hour ago First Use of the Term 'Liberal Democracy'
The term "liberal democracy" was first coined in 1860s France by liberal opponents of Napoleon III. During the Second Empire (1852–1870), particularly in its "liberal moment" of the 1860s, figures such as Eugène Pelletan and Jules Simon used the French phrase "démocratie libérale" to advocate for democratic reforms within an authoritarian regime, emphasizing freedom and civil liberties. You're made up bullshit word wasn't even an invented before The Constitution was ratified so therefore we're a fucking constitutional republic you fucking retard. permalink parent award report block reply guywholikesDjtof2024 1 points 8 hours ago non-Christians* permalink parent award report block reply patrioticwinning3 4 points 10 hours ago Yea!
